headline: Assessing Microchip Technology (MCHP) Valuation After Edge AI Expansion And US$800 Million Convertible Notes Offering
summary: Microchip Technology (MCHP) has extended its edge AI platform with full stack solutions for its microcontrollers and microprocessors, and has also completed an $800 million convertible senior notes offering due 2030 that increases its financial flexibility. See our latest analysis for Microchip Technology. Microchip shares have picked up momentum recently, with a 1 day share price return of 3.29% and a 90 day share price return of 38.16% at US$76.86.
